snippet: The competition, which involves a 2.4-mile swim, a 112-mile bike race and a 26.2-mile run, includes people who have survived life-threatening injuries or illnesses.
abstract: Nearly 3,000 competitors will participate in the Ironman United States Championship, the first Ironman to be held in the New York metropolitan area; Chris Cleary, Robert Geller and Johno Goldsmith are among competitors who have survived life-threatening injuries or illnesses.
lead_paragraph: The competition, which involves a 2.4-mile swim, a 112-mile bike race and a 26.2-mile run, includes people who have survived life-threatening injuries or illnesses.

headline.seo: N.Y. Area’s First Ironman Attracts 3 Who Nearly Died
headline.main: New York’s First Ironman Attracts 3 Who Nearly Died
headline.print_headline: Confronting New York Area’s First Ironman, Three Who Are Already Survivors
